title: The Voice of One Calling
description: For everyone longing to hear the voice of the Lord God, this book will give you fantastic insight on hearing the Lord God's voice. The author gives a detailed story of how she overcame various struggles in her life by surrendering to the Lord God at the lowest point of her life with detailed descriptions of what she had gone through before finally giving her life over to Christ and how he's directed her path from the beginning of her life until now. This is a must-read book for all those who have given up on life, who have turned to everything else to fill the endless void and are contemplating suicide. After reading this book your life will never be the same.
author: Meshelle Goines
